title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8122.42 - Town of Wilna
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8122.42 - Town of Wilna

State Regulations
(a) Route 3. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 3 between the Lewis county line and
the intersection of CR 36 (Route 3A) at Fargo, a distance of 5.6+- miles, are
designated as an access highway for use by 48-foot long, 102- inch wide
trailers, and are not hereby designated as an access highway for any other
types of vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8122.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
